heading: Look at Gaming #108
special_insights:
‚ÄºÔ∏è SPECIAL INSIGHTS üëÄ
powered by AppMagic.rocks üòé
TIn 2022 we've seen Roblox acquire numerous retail brand partnerships from Gucci and Ralph Lauren to Nike. YTD, Roblox generated $777M with 170M downloads, roughly $4.50 per download ‚Äî note that this is only their mobile app.  These revenue figures doesn't include the brand partnership revenue (if any).  Digital fashion is hitting the metaverse.  Haute couture is here and we're about it.  Roblox isn't the only example; platforms such as Fortnite also partnered with Balenciaga and Air Jordan.  The interesting point is that these collabs could be as superficial as cosmetic skins to full-blown in-game on-brand experiences. But are the brands going to continue experimenting/utilizing these platforms in the short-term or would they wanna own the whole user exp themselves?

articles.caption: A look at esports betting platform Rivalry's Q3 earnings.
articles.title: Rivalry's esports betting drives best quarter ever, first net profit | VentureBeat
articles.description: Betting company Rivalry has posted its Q3 2022 financial results which reveals how important esports are to the company's strategy.

articles.caption: A look at Niko's observations from Korea's G-Star 2022 @nikochina
articles.title: Niko Observations from Korea‚Äôs G-Star 2022 ‚Äì Niko
articles.description: Game Show & Trade, All-Round, popularly known as G-Star, first took place in 2005 and is South Korea‚Äôs premier annual games conference. G-Star 2022 was the first full in-person event in 2 years. The event was organized by the Korea Association of Game industry (K-GAMES), managed by G-STAR Organizing Committee and Busan IT Industry Promotion

articles.description: The IAB has released its Metaverse for Brands Guide that covers the basics for marketers that don't know where to start.

articles.description: Grow your game throughout the entire game development lifecycle with useful puzzle mobile player insights.

articles.caption: A look at Nintendo squashing unaffiliated Smash Bros esports tournaments
articles.title: Smash Bros esports in chaos: Nintendo quashes unaffiliated events | VentureBeat
articles.description: Are there legal impications now that Nintendo has shut down a major Super Smash Bros. organizer and is requiring licenses for esports events?

articles.caption: A look at Apex Legends Mobile winning best game of 2022 by Google Play
articles.title: Google Play names Apex Legends Mobile the best game of 2022 | VentureBeat
articles.description: Google Play announced the winners of its 2022 Play Awards, including Apex Legends for Best Game and Papers, Please for Best Story.

articles.caption: A look at Sony launching PlayStation Tournament in-platform
articles.title: Sony launches PlayStation Tournaments on PS5 to hype competitive play
articles.description: PlayStation Tournaments, a new feature that's being billed as a next-generation "on-console competitive experience," has officially launched on PlayStation 5.

articles.caption: A look at Spotify's WonderWrapped
articles.title: Spotify debuts WonderWrapped music space on Roblox | VentureBeat
articles.description: As an addition to Spotify Island, Spotify is introducing Spotify Island: WonderWrapped as a new space for fans to engage with music artists on Roblox. The Spotify Island mainland, which has been around on Roblox since May, will be taken over with Wrapped-inspired quests, games, virtual merch, and photo booth opportunities with 12 different artists.¬†[‚Ä¶]

articles.caption: A look at Take-Two shutting down NFTs in GTA servers
articles.title: Take-Two asks MyMetaverse to take down its NFTs in GTA servers | VentureBeat
articles.description: Take-Two and Rockstar Games asked MyMetaverse to take down its GTA server with non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

articles.caption: A look at Limit Break doing a free NFT mint during Super Bowl commercial
articles.title: Limit Break will do free NFT mint during Super Bowl commercial | VentureBeat
articles.description: Limit Break's Gabe Leydon said that his Super Bowl commercial will include a QR code so that players can use it to apply for a free NFT mint.

articles.caption: A look at Animoca to debut its $2B fund to invest into metaverse companies
articles.title: The Block: Animoca plots $2 billion metaverse investment fund: Nikkei
articles.description: Animoca Brands is planning a fund of up to $2 billion to invest in metaverse companies, which is expected to make its first investment next year.

articles.caption: A look at building game studios as capital runs dry by @naavik_co
articles.title: Building Game Studios as Venture Capital Runs Dry ‚Äî Naavik
articles.description:
In a previous issue, we partnered with InvestGame to show that venture 
capital funding for startups has slowed considerably in 2022. In this 
issue, we take a look at various other tactics to build game studios and 
also tease two recent Naavik Pro deconstructions.

articles.description: Swords of Blood has raises $1.6 million in venture funding for its Web3 hack'n'slash role-playing game.
